item.title: mother who withheld cancer medicine gets up to 10 years
item.description: a mother was sentenced to up to 10 years in state prison on friday for withholding chemotherapy drugs that potentially could have saved her autistic son's life.

item.title: senate bill squeezes big oil to ease deficit
item.description: democratic senators introduced a bill on tuesday that would repeal tax breaks enjoyed by the five biggest oil companies, freeing up $21 billion over a decade to ease the budget deficit.

item.title: andre ethier scratched due to sore elbow; hit streak on hold
item.description: andre ethier's quest to push his hitting streak to 30 games is going on hold until at least friday. the los angeles dodgers outfielder was scratched ...

item.title: american apparel ceo raises stake in company
item.description: american apparel inc chief executive dov charney bought 1.8 million shares in the struggling clothing chain, raising his stake in the company to about 54 percent.

item.title: google sets aside $500 million for advertising probe
item.description: google inc said it has set aside $500 million to potentially settle u.s. justice department's probe into the company's online advertising practices, signaling yet another row with the regulators.

item.title: backyard storm shelters become relics of the past
item.description: old-fashioned storm shelters have become relics of the past as developers increasingly build homes and entire neighborhoods without them.

item.title: white house announces plans to reduce prescription drug abuse
item.description: president barack obama's administration unveiled on tuesday a plan to fight what it calls a prescription drug abuse epidemic.

item.title: in storm's aftermath, one family salvages what it can
item.description: sunday's tornado here tore the roof of the johnson home on 29th street, ripped tiles off the floor and totaled two of the family's vehicles. but it did not take the family's grand piano.

item.description: there are suggestions that dominique strauss-kahn's defense will argue that any sex with his accuser was consensual.

item.description: the party just keeps rolling for country music star jason aldean.

item.title: africa: south africa: minister's wife guilty of drug trafficking
item.description: sheryl cwele, the wife of state security minister siyabonga cwele, was convicted thursday on drug trafficking charges, the south african press association reported.

item.title: are tools, iron in warren buffett's sights?
item.description: warren buffett's hunt for a large acquisition could lead to targets like eaton, illinois tool works or cliffs natural resources, all of which seem to fit his recent preference for growth in industries outside of his core insurance unit.

item.title: toshiba partner says chip production resumes
item.description: toshiba's main facility producing flash memory used in tablets and smartphones has resumed production after the japanese earthquake and chip prices could rise due to the setback and logistic problems.

item.description: continued gains in the conference board's index of leading economic indicators suggestthe economy will strengthen as summer approaches.

item.title: brent, us crude extend rise, heating oil rallies
item.description: brent crude futures extended gains to $2 and u.s. crude to more than $1 on wednesday, as a large drop in distillate stockpiles in the united states reported by the government sparked a heating oil futures rally.

item.description: minnesota, long known as the home of norwegian farmers and german brewers, is becoming more diverse.

item.description: while the bulls have improved on both ends of the floor, it is mainly their improvement on the defensive end that has them in the hunt for the top seed in the eastern conference.

item.description: an explosion rocked a natural gas terminal in north sinai near egypt's border with israel on wednesday, sending flames shooting into the air and forcing the country's export pipeline to shut down, security officials said.

item.title: theater review | long island: the menacing passion of 'west side story'
item.description: it is hard to think of another stage musical that piles one blissful number on top of another with such escalating force, and the production at the gateway playhouse serves it up well.

item.title: tearful vieira says quitting "today" for family

item.title: ford f-150 truck probe expands to 2.7 million

item.title: analysis: data breach shows new "spear-phishing" risk
